    • Method Detail

      • executeGetOnServiceClusterIP

        public Result executeGetOnServiceClusterIP(String requestUrl,
                                           String serviceURL)
        Constructs a URL using the provided service URL and request URL, and use the resulting URL to issue a HTTP GET request
        Parameters:
        requestUrl - The request URL containing the request of the REST call
        serviceURL - The service URL containing the host and port of the server where the HTTP request is to be sent to
        Returns:
        A Result object containing the respond from the REST call

      • executePostUrlOnServiceClusterIP

        public Result executePostUrlOnServiceClusterIP(String requestUrl,
                                               String serviceURL,
                                               String payload)
        Constructs a URL using the provided service URL and request URL, and use the resulting URL and the payload provided to issue a HTTP POST request. This method does not throw HTTPException if the HTTP request returns failure status code
        Parameters:
        requestUrl - The request URL containing the request of the REST call
        serviceURL - The service URL containing the host and port of the server where the HTTP request is to be sent to
        payload - The payload to be used in the HTTP POST request
        Returns:
        A Result object containing the respond from the REST call

      • executePostUrlOnServiceClusterIP

        public Result executePostUrlOnServiceClusterIP(String requestUrl,
                                               String serviceURL,
                                               String payload,
                                               boolean throwOnFailure)
                                        throws HTTPException
        Constructs a URL using the provided service URL and request URL, and use the resulting URL and the payload provided to issue a HTTP POST request
        Parameters:
        requestUrl - The request URL containing the request of the REST call
        serviceURL - The service URL containing the host and port of the server where the HTTP request is to be sent to
        payload - The payload to be used in the HTTP POST request
        throwOnFailure - Throws HTTPException if the status code in the HTTP response indicates any error
        Returns:
        A Result object containing the respond from the REST call
        Throws:
        HTTPException - if throwOnFailure is true and the status of the HTTP response indicates the request was not successful

                                                      String adminSecretName,
                                                      Step next)
        Asynchronous Step for creating an authenticated HTTP client targeted at a server instance
        Parameters:
        namespace - Namespace
        adminSecretName - Admin secret name
        next - Next processing step
        Returns:
        step to create client

      • getServiceURL

        public static String getServiceURL(String name,
                                   String namespace)
        Returns the URL to access the service; using the service clusterIP and port.
        Parameters:
        name - The name of the Service that you want the URL for.
        namespace - The Namespace in which the Service you want the URL for is defined.
        Returns:
        The URL of the Service, or null if it is not found

      • getServiceURL

        public static String getServiceURL(io.kubernetes.client.models.V1Service service)
        Returns the URL to access the Service; using the Service clusterIP and port
        Parameters:
        service - The name of the Service that you want the URL for.
        Returns:
        The URL of the Service or null if the URL cannot be found.
